DOC.brief_summary: Randomized-controlled , multicenter study Trabecular Metal ( TM ) Tapered Screw-Vent ( TSV ) dental implant load early maxillary mandibular site .
DOC.brief_title: TM v TSV Implants Loaded Early vs Conventional Anterior Posterior Areas
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , control , multicenter study ass compare implant stability Trabecular Metal ( TM ) dental implant Tapered Screw-Vent ( TSV ) implant early stage heal i.e . 21 +/- 2 day 42+/- 2 day , well short term clinical outcome .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Benefit implant restoration 2 . Provide voluntarily sign Informed Consent 3 . Must 18 year old 4 . Have one edentulous area ( ) posterior maxilla mandible designate implant support restoration 5 . The implantation site must functional antagonist obtain full occlusion . 6 . Implants adjacent plan site implantation function least 1 year . 7 . The site intend implant placement heal least 4 month time extraction least 6 month bone augmentation procedure . 8 . The site intend implant placement adequate bone volume support implant without need augmentation except minor dehiscence ( limited vertical height 2mm ) , augment autogenous bone chip improve soft tissue attachment . 9 . The site intend implant placement residual facial palatal/lingual plate least 1.0mm thick implant placement . 10 . The site intend implant placement vertical bone volume extend least 2.0mm apical implant implant placement . 1 . Subjects mentally incompetent unable understand provide Informed Consent 2 . Smokers , alcoholic drug abuser 3 . Subjects systemic condition uncontrolled diabetes , endocrine disorder , heart disease , immunecompromised subject mental disorder 4 . Use concurrent medication inhibits bone metabolism like bisphosphonates , corticosteroid methotrexate 5 . Bleeding disorder and/or anticoagulant therapy 6 . Pregnancy 7 . Known sensitivity allergy implant material 8 . Subjects bruxism clench habit 9 . Uncontrolled periodontal oral pathology ( e.g . mucosal disease , oral lesion ) 10 . Inadequate oral hygiene 11 . History radiation site intend study implant placement 12 . Subjects previously fail dental implant site intend study implant placement 13 . Subjects participate another clinical study 14 . Subjects need surgery site adjacent study implant ( ) 15 . Subjects need surgery site nonadjacent study implant ( ) within 6 month study implant placement
